com.example.android.picmymedphotohandler

Class LoadingImageFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.picmymedphotohandler.LoadingImageFiles

  • public class LoadingImageFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads images stored in the internal disk space of the application, and converts those images into Bitmap.
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    1.1, 16/11/18
    Author:
    Md Touhidul (Apu) Islam
